sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词都有"夜，晚上"之意。
means: evening ： 指日落到就寝之间的时间。
night ： 指从日落到日出或从黄昏到拂晓这段时间。

word_mean: night-sky light 太阳落入地平线下18°以后的无月晴夜, 在远离城市灯光的地方, 夜空所呈现的暗弱弥漫光辉。

sentence.Network_en: Two men were helping police with their inquiries at Salisbury last night.
sentence.Network_cn: 两名男子昨天夜里在索尔兹伯里接受了警方盘问。

sentence.Network_en: That was the first time Elliot stayed out all night.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是埃利奥特第一次彻夜未归。

sentence.Network_en: Last night he was being held in solitary confinement in Douglas jail.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨晚他被单独监禁在道格拉斯的监狱里。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...tles[2-4][5]幕后花絮这是《西域威龙》的续集， 片名是为了跟“正午”（noon）相对立的“夜晚”（night），然后演变成谐音的“骑士”（knight）。故事横跨中美英三地。片中有很多调侃片断，如《》等，并把等.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English neaht, niht, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch nacht and German Nacht, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin nox and Greek nux

entry.def: The night is the part of each day when the sun has set and it is dark outside, especially the time when people are sleeping.

example.ex: He didn't sleep a wink all night...
The fighting began in the late afternoon and continued all night...
example.tran: 战斗在傍晚时分打响，持续了一夜。

entry.tran: 晚间，晚上(尤指睡觉前放松的时间)
entry.def: The night is the period of time between the end of the afternoon and the time that you go to bed, especially the time when you relax before going to bed.

example.ex: So whose party was it last night?...
example.tran: 那么，昨晚的聚会是谁办的？

example.ex: Demiris took Catherine to dinner the following night.
example.tran: 第二天晚上，德米里斯请凯瑟琳共进晚餐。

entry.tran: (演出等的)夜场，夜间活动，…之夜
entry.def: A particular night is a particular evening when a special event takes place, such as a show or a play.

example.ex: The first night crowd packed the building.

entry.def: If it is a particular time at night, it is during the time when it is dark and is before midnight.

example.ex: It's eleven o'clock at night in Moscow...
He works obsessively from 7.15 am to 9 or 10 at night.
example.tran: 他工作极为投入，会从早上七点一刻一直干到晚上九十点。

entry.def: If something happens at night, it happens regularly during the evening or night.

example.ex: He was going to college at night, in order to become an accountant...
example.tran: 为了成为会计师，他上夜校学习。

example.ex: The veranda was equipped with heavy wooden rain doors that were kept closed at night.
example.tran: 阳台装有厚重的木制防雨门，夜里是关着的。

entry.def: If something happens day and night or night and day, it happens all the time without stopping.

example.ex: Dozens of doctors and nurses have been working day and night for weeks...
example.tran: 很多医生和护士已经夜以继日地工作数周了。

example.ex: He was at my door night and day, demanding my attention.
example.tran: 他日日夜夜呆在我门口，想引起我的注意。

entry.def: If you have an early night, you go to bed early. If you have a late night, you go to bed late.

example.ex: I've had a hell of a day, and all I want is an early night...
example.tran: 这一天糟透了，我就想早点上床睡觉。

example.ex: In spite of the travelling and the late night, she did not feel tired.
example.tran: 尽管旅途劳顿，而且睡得很晚，她并没觉得累。

means.word_mean: 1. the time after sunset and before sunrise while it is dark outside
2. the time between sunset and midnight;
4. the dark part of the diurnal cycle considered a time unit;
7. a period of ignorance or backwardness or gloom

list.explanation: [夜晚告别时的亲切用语]晚安!再见!

example.en: Night-night! I hope you sleep well.

auth_sentence.content: The rest is the history of late-night whiskey cool.
auth_sentence.res_content: The rest is the history of late-night whiskey cool.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The rest is the history of late-night whiskey cool.

auth_sentence.content: The late-night letter is always composed in three drafts.
auth_sentence.res_content: The late-night letter is always composed in three drafts.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The late-night letter is always composed in three drafts.

auth_sentence.content: Some of the work has been completed at night.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some of the work has been completed at night.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some of the work has been completed at night.

Sentence.sentence: And a room with books in it induces, at least in some, a feeling not dissimilar to that of a fire in the fireplace on a cold winter's night.
Once she lost a two-cent stamp and spent the night looking for it.
Some people, however, can get by with just a few hours of sleep at night
I guess you watch the quiz show on television last night.
He had a finger hurt last night
I tried to call you all night yesterday.

sentences.en: He determined to travel no further that night.
sentences.cn: 他决定那天晚上不再往前走了。

sentences.en: I'll never forgive you for what you said to me last night.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会宽恕你昨晚对我所说的话。

jushi.chinese: 她度过了一个不眠之夜。

jushi.english: He stayed three nights at the hotel.
When did they separate last night?
jushi.chinese: 昨晚他们什么时候分手的?
